Favored Enemy: Adv on Survival to track, Adv on Intelligence to recall info about, and may learn the language of 2 chosen creature types

Natural Explorer: Dbl Proficiency on Intelligence and Wisdom, moves normally through difficult terrain, never becomes lost, remains always alert, may stealth alone at full speed, locates dbl food, and gains extra info from tracking in 3 chosen terrain types

Swift Quiver (R5 Tran): Touched quiver dispenses ammo endlessly and allows two ranged attacks in a bonus action for conc up to 1 min
Tree Stride (R5 Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees 1/rd for conc up to 1 min

Magic Notes: Primeval Awareness: May spend a spell slot to sense creatures in a 1 mile radius (favored terrain 6 mile radius) for 1 min/slot level
